en.topSiteText: Creativity and innovation go hand in hand. With a unique combination of impactful design, intuitive functionality, and optimization for results, I am ready to create the online presence of your dreams.
en.webDesignText: I currently develop websites with a main focus and purpose, such as: information, sales, portfolio, among others, applying skills in various languages and technologies, to create an optimized and visually attractive user experience, with an emphasis on usability and accessibility.
en.programmingLanguagesText: The main web development languages include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for structure and interactivity; PHP and Laravel for the back-end; React and Node.js for interfaces and servers; as well as SQL and MongoDB for data, and SCSS for advanced styling.
en.teamWorkText: I have extensive experience in teamwork, valuing collaboration and communication to achieve common goals. Throughout my journey, I have learned to listen, contribute ideas, and adapt to different work styles, always aiming for efficient and harmonious results.
en.aboutMeTitle: NICE TO MEET YOU, MY NAME IS TIAGO GAGO.
en.aboutMeText1: I am a technology enthusiast, a Full Stack Developer Website professional in Lisbon, Portugal üåç. I'm here to help turn ideas into powerful, technology-based solutions!
en.aboutMeText2: I am a Junior Full Stack website developer and love working on both front-end and back-end projects. My focus is to make development smooth and scalable, whether building an elegant web application, automating workflows, or creating efficient database solutions and web page creation. I am always looking for new technologies that can streamline work and make life easier.
